title: (x) MoMA Queens - (similar to) Office {Yves}
content:
Hello,   
   
Anyone know this font used by Base for the MoMA queens pieces. they seem to have used all caps so im afraid so is this image. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106172852im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39606.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Prudential - custom face (based on Century Schoolbook) {Karl}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106172852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5422 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dutch football shirt name and No. - AG Grotesk Cd {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106172852/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5389 "Go to next forum topic")
author: david_leonard

comments.content: It _could_ be [Lineto](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106172852/http:/lineto.com/)'s Office Bold, but the $ doesn't match.

thanks Yves.   
That has to be right.
